Stating it as “A piece of American History” George Zimmerman has now crossed another line and made news around the world after attempting to sell the very gun he used to shoot and kill Teenager Trayvon Martin. 

As Zimmerman wants to put himself down in American history for siting prejudice and fury we see it only fit that his name is removed from it altogether. 

‘Forget Zimmerman’ Is a free Google Chrome plug-in which removes George Zimmerman’s name and tagged photos from all webpages leaving a blank space in its place.
